alert.note: Alert for Delta (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:50PM EDT until July 10 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DELTA...SCHOOLCRAFT AND SOUTHWESTERN ALGER COUNTIES... At 750 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Steuben, or 17 miles northwest of Manistique, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Munising, Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, Au Train, Germfask, Seney, M-94 between Steuben and Manistique, Blaney Park, Shingleton, Steuben, M-28 between Shingleton and Seney, Christmas and Chicago Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
